data.title: DCC Annual Report: Fiscal Year 2021-22
data.excerpt: Business and Professions Code section 26190 established annual reporting requirements for the Department of Cannabis Control (Department). Beginning March 1, 2023, and annually thereafter, the Department must prepare and submit to the Legislature an annual report on activities within the Department for the prior fiscal year.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
